backend/main.mo: Implements click tracking with a map storing per-button click counts and exposes methods to record clicks and query counts.
backend/migration.mo: Defines a migration that initializes a new actor state containing an empty clickCounts map.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping new payment-related features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of many frontend files describing their purpose, content structures, and UI behavior.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point configuring meta tags, PWA manifest, icons, and loads the main React app.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, theme colors, and startup behavior.
frontend/public/offline.html: Standalone offline fallback page with styling, a retry button, and auto-reconnect logic.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing precaching, cache cleanup, navigation fallback, and cache-first fetch handling.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component wiring navigation, sections, search index, and service worker registration into the site layout.
frontend/src/components/BoostlyLink.tsx: Displays the site’s current URL in a read‑only input with a button to copy it using the clipboard API.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a multi-column footer with branding, resource links, social icons, and a copyright notice.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Hero section with headline, CTA buttons, a preview image, and an embedded BoostlyLink component.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Minimal layout component that wraps children in a full-height flex container.
frontend/src/components/MarketingNav.tsx: Responsive navigation bar with search, desktop links, and a mobile sheet menu that triggers section navigation.
frontend/src/components/sections/BroadTo: Section displaying guidance cards for broad content topics with icons, tips, and optional disclaimers.
frontend/src/components/sections/Content: Section listing content-type guidance cards with descriptions, numbered tips, and optional disclaimers.
frontend/src/components/sections/CoreGro: Renders growth tip cards and actionable checklists using content arrays, with icons and UI components. Provides structured sections for strategies and checklists.
frontend/src/components/sections/FaqSect: Displays FAQ items in an accordion layout sourced from site content. Provides collapsible question‑and‑answer entries.
frontend/src/components/sections/GetBoos: Handles PWA install prompt logic and shows installation status plus platform-specific instructions. Includes cards for install actions and guidance for iOS and other platforms.
frontend/src/components/sections/Payment: Shows monetization options for Apple Pay and Cash App with click tracking. Displays cards, click counts, and external payment link buttons.
frontend/src/components/sections/Platfor: Renders platform-specific growth tips in tabbed cards using dynamic icons and content. Each tab shows tips for a social platform.
frontend/src/components/sections/ToolsRe: Lists categorized tools and resources with icons and links. Provides cards for planning, design, analytics, and checklist resources.
frontend/src/components/SiteSearch.tsx: Search bar with live filtering, keyboard navigation, and clickable results tied to the provided search index.
Defines a guidance item type and provides topic-based content guidance with tips and keywords for mental health, learning, and collaboration.
frontend/src/content/contentTypeGuidance: Defines a content-type guidance structure and includes tips, keywords, and optional disclaimers for various content styles.
frontend/src/content/growthGuidance.ts: Provides growth tips and checklists covering profile optimization, content strategy, consistency, engagement, hashtags, analytics, and collaboration.
frontend/src/content/siteContent.ts: Centralizes platform-specific tips and FAQs for social media growth and safe content creation across major platforms.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context and provider for authentication management, including login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/usePaymentClickCounts: Hook for fetching, tracking, and updating payment button click counts using the backend actor and React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/usePwaInstall.ts: Manages PWA installability state and exposes an install function using the beforeinstallprompt event.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides a placeholder hook returning actor and loading state for future backend queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables, dark mode values, typography rules, and custom utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers the service worker on window load and logs registration status.
frontend/src/search/scrollAndHighlight.t: Scrolls smoothly to an element and applies a temporary highlight and focus effect.
frontend/src/search/searchIndex.ts: Builds a unified search index from multiple content sources and provides token-based relevance scoring.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and extended theme options.
project_state.json: Describes the project state, features, goals, and architectural notes for the Boostly app.
